description:
The most basic of lightning-element attacks. It still packs quite a punch,
though. Damages 1 extra enemy. \c[27]\bpdamage[275]%\c[0] MAT rate.
name: Lightning I
note:
<Boost Damage>
<Require Weapon Types: 3>
<Switch to Weapon: Wand>

<Remove State Category: Water>
<Remove State Category: Wind>

<setup action>
display action
perform start
motion chant: user
wait: 45
motion skill: user
</setup action>

<target action>
action animation
wait: 10
action effect
clear battle log
wait: 5
</target action>

<finish action>
clear battle log
perform finish
</finish action>

<Damage Formula>
// Set the chain multiplier to a value if it doesn't exist.
this._chainmultiplier = this._chainmultiplier || 1.0;
// This is the damage formula.
value = a.mat * 3 - b.mdf * 2;
// Apply the chain multiplier to the damage formula.
value *= this._chainmultiplier;
// Reduce the chain multiplier per target.
this._chainmultiplier *= 0.5;
</Damage Formula>

<Custom Target Eval>
// Adds the selected target to the target list.
targets.push(target);
// Grab the group of alive foes as candidates.
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
// Remove the target from the group of candidates.
members.splice(members.indexOf(target), 1);
// This is the number of extra targets to select with Chain Lightning.
var extraTargets = 1
// Loop the extra targets.
while (extraTargets--) {
  // Grab a random foe from the alive foes.
  var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
  // Check to see if the member exists.
  if (member) {
    // Add the member to the group of targets.
    targets.push(member);
    // Remove the member as a viable candidate.
    members.splice(members.indexOf(member), 1);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>

description:

description: Reveal \c[27]\bpanalyze[1]\c[0] weakness\bp[es] and HP of a single enemy.
name: Analyze
note:
<Require Weapon Types: 4>
<Switch to Weapon: Staff>

<Learn Cost: 1000 JP>

<Analyze Weakness: 1>

<Boost Analyze>

<Before Eval>
if (target.barrierPoints() > 0) {
  var text = '\\c[4]' + target.name() + '\\c[0]: ' + Yanfly.Util.toGroup(target.hp) + '\\c[13]+(' + target.barrierPoints() + ')\\c[0]/' + Yanfly.Util.toGroup(target.mhp);
} else {
  var text = '\\c[4]' + target.name() + '\\c[0]: ' + Yanfly.Util.toGroup(target.hp) + '/' + Yanfly.Util.toGroup(target.mhp);
}
$gameMessage.add(text);
BattleManager.addText("Analysis successful!", 0);
</Before Eval>

<action copy: skill:7>

description:
A much stronger lightning attack, guaranteed to fry an enemy and even sometimes
paralyze them. Damages 2 extra enemies. \c[27]\bpdamage[425]%\c[0] MAT rate.
name: Lightning II
note:
<Boost Damage>

<Remove State Category: Water>
<Remove State Category: Wind>

<action copy: skill:9>

<Damage Formula>
// Set the chain multiplier to a value if it doesn't exist.
this._chainmultiplier = this._chainmultiplier || 1.0;
// This is the damage formula.
value = a.mat * 3 - b.mdf * 2;
// Apply the chain multiplier to the damage formula.
value *= this._chainmultiplier;
// Reduce the chain multiplier per target.
this._chainmultiplier *= 0.8;
</Damage Formula>

<Custom Target Eval>
// Adds the selected target to the target list.
targets.push(target);
// Grab the group of alive foes as candidates.
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
// Remove the target from the group of candidates.
members.splice(members.indexOf(target), 1);
// This is the number of extra targets to select with Chain Lightning.
var extraTargets = 2
// Loop the extra targets.
while (extraTargets--) {
  // Grab a random foe from the alive foes.
  var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
  // Check to see if the member exists.
  if (member) {
    // Add the member to the group of targets.
    targets.push(member);
    // Remove the member as a viable candidate.
    members.splice(members.indexOf(member), 1);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>

<action copy: skill:1>

description:
Swaps HP and MP percentages.
Base MP cost is equal to \c[27]\bp0[15%]\bp=1[12%]\bp=2[9%]\bp=3[6%]\bp=4[3%]\bp=5[0%]\c[0] of the user's MMP.
name: Change of Heart
note:
<Custom MP Cost>
cost = Math.ceil(user.mmp * (0.15 - (user.bp * 0.03)));
if(cost==0){$gameVariables.setValue(6, 'Free');}else{$gameVariables.setValue(6, ' ');};
</Custom MP Cost>
<Custom Cost Display>
\c[27]\}\V[6]
</Custom Cost Display>

<After Eval>
var hpRate = (user.hp / user.mhp);
var mpRate = (user.mp / user.mmp);
user.setHp(Math.ceil(user.mhp * mpRate));
user.setMp(Math.ceil(user.mmp * hpRate));
</After Eval>

description:

\it[22], or \it[23].

<Require = 0 BP>

perform start

<target action>
motion skill: user
EVAL: $gameVariables.setValue(6, Math.floor(Math.random() * 3));
IF ($gameVariables.value(6) === 0)
animation 61: target
wait for animation
EVAL: SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText("The target was silenced!");
add state 21: target
END
IF ($gameVariables.value(6) === 1)
animation 62: target
wait for animation
EVAL: SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText("The target was put to sleep!");
add state 22: target
END
IF ($gameVariables.value(6) === 2)
animation 63: target
wait for animation
EVAL: SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText("The target was confused!");
add state 23: target
END
wait: 30
</target action>

</follow action>

perform finish
